name: The Fantastical Adventure of Tom the Kangaroo
name_original: The Fantastical Adventure of Tom the Kangaroo
description:
This is a minigame I made that is to be featured in a larger project that I have been working on for a while now. I wanted to upload this as I haven't uploaded anything on itch in a while, so here it is. Have fun and don't hesitate to leave any feedback in the comments section. 

NOTE: THERE IS NO MORE CONTENT WHEN THE SCREEN GOES TO STATIC

edit: clicking the EXIT or QUIT button does nothing in this build of the game
